title: NodeTimer
description: Instrumentation data provided by the AP.

created.description: When file containing the instrumentation data has been created for the first time.

nodes.description: Statistics for native nodes that have been used so far.

metaNodes.description: Either an empty object or the statistics for metanodes (aggregated for all metanodes).

wrappedNodes.description: Either an empty object or the statistics for components (aggregated for all components).

createdVia.description: A map from the 'node creation type' (JAVA_UI, WEB_UI, JAVA_UI_HUB, WEB_UI_HUB, WEB_UI_QUICK_INSERTION_RECOMMENDED) to the number of times a node has been created that way.

settingsChanged.description: The number of times node settings were changed by the user via a dialog.

uptime.description: Average up-time (moving average relative to the number of launches).

workflowsOpened.description: The total number of workflows that have been opened in classic or modern UI.

remoteWorkflowsOpened.description: The total number of workflows opened from a Server or Hub repository (not via the remote workflow editor).

workflowsCreated.description: The total number of workflows created in the local space

remoteWorkflowsCreated.description: The total number of workflows created on a Server or Hub repository

columnarStorageWorkflowsOpened.description: The number of workflows that have been opened with the columnar backend enabled.

workflowsImported.description: The number of worklfows imported (via classic or modern UI). The import of a workflow group is counted as 1.

workflowsExported.description: The number of workflows exported (via classic or modern UI). The export of a workflow group is counted as 1.

webUIPerspectiveSwitches.description: The number of switches to the modern (web-based) UI.

javaUIPerspectiveSwitches.description: The number of switches to the classic (java-based) UI.

lastUsedPerspective.description: The last used perspective (e.g. starter nodes).

lastApplicationID.description: A unique identifier of the application. Potentially controlled by the 'eclipse.application' system property.

timeSinceLastStart.description: The uptime since the last start.

crashes.description: The number of times the AP was not shutdown properly.

properlyShutDown.description: Whether the file was written on shutdown or not. Not relevant for instrumentation, just used to estimate the number of crashes.

id.description: A globally unique id that will never change for a particular node. Not present in case of metanodes and components.

nrexecs.description: The overall number of executions of this node.

nrfails.description: The overall number of failures of this node.

exectime.description: The total execution time of all node execution together.

nrcreated.description: The overall numbers of creations of this node.

successor.description: The id of the most recently used successor-node for this node.

successornodename.description: The name of the successor specified via the id at 'successor'.
